content: off row 1 knit cast off all sts ears make 2 start at the bottom edge cast on 6 sts in brown on 3mm needles row 1 knit row 2 k1 kfb knit to end 7 sts row 3 to 5 repeat row 2 three more times 10 sts row 6 to 14 knit row 15 k1 k2tog knit to end 9 sts row 16 to 20 repeat row 15 five more times 4 sts cast off all sts loyal puppy copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 3 of 4 making up ⇨ note use mattress stitch for seaming head note that the cast off sts are the top of the head fold the piece in half and sew together the cast off edge along the bridge of the snout insert the toy safety eyes sew the side edges together down the back of the head stuffing as you sew finish by sewing together the cast on edge along the underside of the head see photo below embroider the nose in black yarn nose seam bridge of snout bottom of head ears sew the cast off edge of each ear onto the top of the head body sew the side edges together stuffing as you sew gather the cast on sts together at the back join head and body sew the bottom of the head onto the top of the body tail sew the side edges together and sew the cast on edge to the top of the body at the back feet sew the side edges together down the back of the foot adding a little stuffing as you sew sew the cast on edge of each foot onto the underside of the body collar wrap around the neck and sew the two short side ends together loyal puppy copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 4 of 4
